contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Station | name=University | type=[[Metrorail (Miami)|Metrorail]] [[metro station]] | image= | image_size=300px | image_caption= | address=5400 Ponce de Leon Boulevard<br>Coral Gables, Florida 33146 | coordinates={{coord|25|42|53|N|80|16|36|W|type:railwaystation_region:US-FL|display=inline,title}} | line={{rail color box| system=MDM| line=Green}}{{rail color box| system=MDM| line=Orange}} | other={{bus icon|12px|Local Transit}} [[University (Metrorail station)#Metrobus|Metrobus]]: 48, 56, 500<br>{{bus icon|12px|Local Transit}} [[University (Metrorail station)#Alternative modes of transport|UM 'Canes Shuttle]] | platform=1 [[island platform]] | tracks=2 | parking=[[Park and ride]] (401 spaces) | bicycle=[[Bicycle stand|Rack]] | passengers=636,000 <ref>http://www.miamidade.gov/transit/ridership-technical-reports.asp</ref> | pass_year=2012 | pass_percent=16 | opened=May 20, 1984 | rebuilt= | ADA=Yes | code=UNV | owned=[[Miami-Dade County, Florida|Miami-Dade County]] | zone= | services= {{s-rail|title=MDM}} {{s-line|system=MDM|line=Green|previous=Douglas Road|next=South Miami|type=Palmetto|type2=Dadeland South|rows2=2}} {{s-line|system=MDM|line=Orange|previous=Douglas Road|next=South Miami|type=Airport|type2=Dadeland South|hide=true|hide2=true}} }} '''University''' is a [[Metrorail (Miami)|Metrorail]] station in the [[suburb]]an city of [[Coral Gables, Florida|Coral Gables]], [[Florida]] at the [[University of Miami]] (UM), seven miles southwest of [[Downtown Miami|Downtown]] [[Miami]]. This station, opened to service May 20, 1984, is located along Ponce de Leon Boulevard at the intersection of [[South Dixie Highway]] ([[U.S. Route 1 in Florida|US 1]]) and Mariposa Court. The stop provides particular convenience to UM students, staff, and [[residency (medicine)|resident physicians]] traveling between the Coral Gables campus, the [[Leonard M. Miller School of Medicine|medical campus]] at the [[Jackson Memorial Hospital|UM/Jackson Memorial Medical Center]] at [[Civic Center (Metrorail station)|Civic Center station]] in the [[Civic Center (Miami)|Civic Center Health District]], and direct access to [[Downtown Miami]] and [[Miami International Airport]]. ==Places of interest== *University of Miami **[[BankUnited Center]] **[[Alex Rodriguez Park at Mark Light Field]] **[[Lowe Art Museum]] **[http://www.music.miami.edu/facility/gusman/ Gusman Concert Hall] **[[University of Miami School of Law]] *BMI Building *[http://www.healthsouth.com/medinfo/home/app/frame HealthSouth Doctors Hospital] ==Transit connections== ===[[Miami-Dade Transit#Metrobus|Metrobus]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Route # ! Route Name ! Route Map ! Note |- |'''48''' |Brickell |[http://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/routes/48.pdf Map] |Weekday Service Only |- |'''56''' |Coral Gables ↔ [[Miami Dade College]] ([[Kendall, Florida|Kendall Campus]]) ''or'' SW 162 Ave ('''56A''') via Miller Road (South 56th St) |[http://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/routes/56.pdf Map] |56A operates weekdays only |- |'''500''' |[[Stephen P. Clark Government Center|Government Center Downtown Bus Terminal]] ↔ Dadeland South station |[http://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/routes/500.pdf Map] |Overnight service only |} ===Alternative modes of transport=== *'''UM Hurry 'Canes Shuttle''' – Stanford Circle ↔ Ponce de Leon Parking Garage ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.miamidade.gov/transit/metrorail-stations.asp MDT – Metrorail Stations] * [http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&ie=UTF8&ll=25.71527,-80.277014&spn=0.004785,0.013733&z=17&layer=c&cbll=25.71527,-80.277014&panoid=9LkJwebCHWj93v5cRfKTcQ&cbp=12,159.3,,0,-2.66 Station from Google Maps Street View] [[Category:Miami Metrorail stations]] [[Category:Coral Gables, Florida]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1984]] {{South Florida rail metro system}} {{University of Miami}}
